nl.esciencecenter.neon.shaders

Class FragmentShader

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.neon.shaders.Shader
      • nl.esciencecenter.neon.shaders.FragmentShader

  • public class FragmentShader
extends Shader
    Fragment shader object representation. These shaders represent the final stage of the rendering process, where every proto-pixel is given a color.
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen
